data.system_settings: Canary latest (But this has been known for a while).
data.actual_result: A user with no role will not see any text channels (even the default one). They get a 403 error in the console. They can see Administrator users but no one else (not even themselves) in the user list.
data.expected_result: This is not possible (option greyed out and checked)
data.short_description: Can remove "Read Message" rights from everyone role and hide default channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings, Roles - Uncheck "Read Messages" from the @everyone role
